The coast of Bay of Bengal witnessed the rise of a new era of technical education as one of India\'s Institute of national importance, National Institute of Technology, Puducherry, got established in 2010, at Karaikal. Karaikal, formerly known for its diverse culture and cuisines is now redefining the standards of technical education. NIT Puducherry is famous for its advancements made in technical fields and a major contribution is done through the Institute\'s proudest event, Gyanith. Since it\'s inception in 201., Gyanith is setting up a new benchmark every year, in the number of events as well as in the number of participants. Spreading its fame across Puducherry, Tamil Nadu, and Kerala, Gyanith is now ready to be India\'s largest sought technical platform, with its.. th edition, where it comes up with more events, newer and better! After the curtain raiser of Gyanith \'20, the highlights are many workshops on hot and trending topics in technical fields, handled by the person of expertise from the respective areas. Apart from the technical events, Gyanith is a platform to bring up young and talented brains from the school benches through its science expos and project expos are awaiting the students pursuing undergraduate and higher degrees. Also with a big fat stage with non restricting mike, we welcome all the proficient performers to come and entertain our great audience through our non technical events.Gyanith \'20 is this undoubtedly, a great opportunity to showcase and widen your vistas of knowledge.
